int cvmx_uart_setup2 ( int  uart_index,
int  cpu_clock_hertz,
int  baudrate 
)

Function that does the real work of setting up the Octeon uart.

Takes all parameters as arguments, so it does not require gd structure to be set up.

Parameters:
uart_index Index of uart to configure
cpu_clock_hertz CPU clock frequency in Hz
baudrate Baudrate to configure
Returns:
0 on success !0 on error
